document_data.mainbody:
Calimshan Knots was a variety of sweet pastry from Calimshan, baked and sold in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
During the strife of the , brought on by the Absolute crisis, many businesses within Baldurs Gate that were under the protection of the Guild were faced with increased payment. A certain bakery in the city informed the Guilds bursar, Uktar that it could no longer pay due to the lockdowns and inability to sell goods across the districts of Baldurs Gate. The last payment due was "negotiated" by the Guilds representative, a "half-orc with the sticky fingers," who agreed to take what was due in the form of Calimshan Knots.
